Advisory.Description: Nepxion Discovery is a solution for Spring Cloud. Discovery is vulnerable to a potential Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF). RouterResourceImpl uses RestTemplateâ€™s getForEntity to retrieve the contents of a URL containing user-controlled input, potentially resulting in Information Disclosure. There is no patch available for this issue at time of publication. There are no known workarounds.
Advisory.Summary: Nepxion Discovery vulnerable to potential Information Disclosure due to  Server-Side Request Forgery
